title: FS:  T3 Turkey Reds (S.C. Find) mid-low grades
author: T3s

posts.post_title: FS:  T3 Turkey Reds (S.C. Find) mid-low grades
posts.post_content:
Hi,

Good afternoon.  There was such a rush of emails and PMs over the last several days relating to the T3s for sale.  The first group of cards all sold very quickly and so I decided to offer several more.  I was planning to send most of these cards to PSA and then sell them.  They are nicer cards in general and will cost a bit more as well. 

As noted, guaranteed authentic and unaltered.  No trimming either.

Please note that where I've noted writing, etc, these in general are very minor and don't take away from the overall beauty of the card.  PSA would need to give them an MK, but if not getting them graded, you may not care.

Happy to send front and back scans.

If you are looking for a specific card that is not on this list, please ask.

Lastly, I currently have about 30 other PSA-graded T3s available for sale on my website - [url]www.t3turkeyred.com[/url] - please check them out.  The prices are outdated (a bit high and very much open to negotiation).


2. Bergen - scribble of pencil on front border o/w VGEX  $250
3. Leach - writing and scrapes on back o/w very nice EX $325
8. Clarke - a bit of pencil on back  VG+ SOLD
8. Clarke - nice card but a but out of register, no writing EX $1100
14. Dooin - scribbles on front and back, o/w VGEX SOLD
17. Griffith - nicer than first, lots of writing on back G-VG $300
22. Krause - some creasing o/w looks EX  PSA-2.5  $200
30. Mullin - some pencil but nice VGEX  $250
32. Overall - writing on back o/w nice VGEX $250
41. Wiltse - tiny marks on back  o/w nice VGEX $250
43. Out at Third - some pencil on nameplate o/w very nice VGEX $275
44. Trying to Catch Him - name underlined on back o/w clean VGEX $275
49. A Close Play - some pencil marks ow/ nice VGEX+  $325
96. Groom - light creasing  PSA-3 $275
112. Paskert -Cin - small writing on front border o/w nice VGEX SOLD

Thanks very much,
Craig

great doing business with you!!
all the best,
barry

Hi,

One bump before sending most off for grading.

Thanks again to all those who bought cards - they are on the way!

Feel free to make offers on these, and if you are searching for a specific T3 just let me know as I may have it available.

Happy Collecting,
Craig
